alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 23 at 7:15PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...BLIZZARD CONDITIONS WILL MAKE TRAVEL NEARLY IMPOSSIBLE FOR PORTIONS OF JEFFERSON COUNTY THIS EVENING... HAZARDS...The combination of a band of heavy snow and winds gusting to 55 mph is producing BLIZZARD conditions. In this band visibility is LESS than a quarter mile. Do not attempt to travel in this band. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 713 PM EST, a band of heavy snow covered most of Jefferson county north of Adams and Fort Drum. The band is expected to remain nearly stationary or drift a little north through 830 pm. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Watertown, Fort Drum, Stony Point, Dexter, Glen Park, Redwood, Henderson Harbor, Southwick Beach State Park, Adams Center, Sackets Harbor, Henderson, Black River, Smithville, Philadelphia, Brownville, Theresa, Cape Vincent, Antwerp, Chaumont and Evans Mills. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 42 and 49. SAFETY INFO... Travel is nearly impossible in this area, with blizzard conditions. &&
